description: CSS file defining styles and theme variables for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for text alignment, background color, and transitions.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component styling with a background, alignment, and responsive design.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links in the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background, and hover effects.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including size and animation effects.
